Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              1.	Project Timeline
              
              Expected starting date: July 2018
              

              2.	Number of required resources: 1-2
              

              3.	Project size: 30 Resources
              

              4.	Working Location:
              
              CMC global Ltd, CMC tower, 11 Duy Tân, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội
              

              5.	Job description:
              
              Do you want challenge with new opportunities?
              
              You want to work in an international environment with international colleagues; you are interested in keeping track of latest technologies? You want to work under mentorship of experienced colleagues, doing the best engineering practices.
              
              Just come to get a hot seat at CMC global and shine your career.
              
              We are looking for 2 passionate Software Architect .Net to develop our customer system.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	C# and .NET framework is mandatory.
              
              -	Understand business and framework from reading the source code.
              
              -	Experienced of OOP, design patterns, web services and SQL server database
              
              -	Experienced with making architect solution for building new software project, special in web.
              
              -	Experienced for migration .NET system.
              
              -	Knowledge of HTML and Javascript, knowing at least 1 Javascript library or framework
              
              -	Understanding testing methodologies and give solution for testing.
              
              -	Passionate about quality and the design of the code, productivity of the work and maintainability of the end result
              
              -	Communicate your ideas & knowledge to team mates
              
              -	Self-organized, work in multifunctional and diverse team of enthusiastic tech people
              
              -	Ability to communicate clearly and concisely, both orally and in writing, as an advocate for technology solutions.
              
              -	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with proven ability to design pragmatic solutions.
              
              Soft-skills
              
              -	Possible to co-work with team.
              
              -	Good English skills, including the ability to convey information to non-technical colleagues in a concise and clear way.
              
              -	Teamwork skills
              
              -	Good at investigating and solving incident and problem skill.
              
              - Self-motivated and Self-directed.
              

              Bonus points if you have some of this
              
              - Experienced with Win Form or Web Form.
              
              - Experienced with SCRUM, GIT or Team Foundation Server
              
              - Fluent Spoken English
              
              - .NET core and Angular 2 experience and knowledge
              
              - Team leadership and project management experience
              

              Contact
              
              Global HR: via VietnamWorks
              
              CMC Global | 8&9 Floor, CMC Tower, Duy Tan, Cau Giay, Hanoi
